name: FingerMaze HD
description:
FingerMaze HD is a game where you have to solve mazes of increasing difficulty in the shortest time possible.

Features include:

• 160 hand-selected mazes from 15 different categories
• 3 random maze generators with different difficulty levels for endless maze-solving fun
• Gold and silver medal awards for fast maze-solving

Note, only the first 3 mazes are free. You can unlock all other mazes (or the random maze generators) with an in-app purchase.
